verbs.description: [ARG0: pilot] [V: flying] j ex - pres wants christmas at home before prison the former president of the largest u s fuel retailer wants to spend the winter holidays at home before reporting to prison for his role in a scheme to defraud trucking companies a federal judge had previously granted mark hazelwood request to postpone reporting to prison for his 12 ½-year sentence until after thanksgiving the knoxville news sentinel reports the 59-year - old lawyers argued in a motion filed last week that he should be granted christmas and new year day too two other former pilot flying j employees have until jan 7 to surrender president knoxville tenn mark hazelwood u s pilot flying j chattanooga knoxville tennessee gov bill haslam bill haslam prison cleveland browns chattanooga tennessee jimmy haslam christmas
